subject: New York City Marathon
Children and Youth
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Wesley Paul, Scott Black and Howie Breinan ran the New York City Marathon as 8- and 9-year-olds, before an age requirement existed. They have no regrets.
snippet: Wesley Paul, Scott Black and Howie Breinan ran the New York City Marathon as 8- and 9-year-olds, before an age requirement existed. They have no regrets.
